articles.title: The Bitcoin Mempool: What Is It For?
articles.author: system
articles.summary: There is no such thing as 'the' mempool. Every individual full Bitcoin node operates its own mempool, a cache of valid bitcoin transactions that have been broadcast to the network but have yet to be seen by the rest of the network. Everyone who has used bitcoin has made use of the mempools.
